casebody.data:
Veronique K. PONGO, et al., petitioners,
v.
BANK OF AMERICA, et al. No. 15-6517. Supreme Court of the United States Dec. 14, 2015.

Motion of petitioners for leave to proceed in forma pauperis denied. Petitioners allowed until January 4, 2016, within which to pay docketing fee required by Rule 38(a) and to submit a petition in compliance with Rule 33.1 of the Rules of this Court.
